discourse_list.title: EIP-4490: Decrease transaction calldata gas cost without enforcing an additional max block size

content.content: A simplified version of EIP-4488 to decrease transaction calldata gas cost without enforcing an additional max block size See: Second transaction data gas cost reduction by louisguthmannStarkWare· Pull Request #4490 · ethereum/EIPs
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proposal, specifically EIP-4490, which aims to decrease transaction calldata gas cost without enforcing an additional max block size. The post also mentions a related proposal, EIP-4488, and provides a link to a pull request on GitHub. Additionally, the post invites feedback and constructive criticism on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
